product_name: L'angeLe Ceramique Luxe Digital 1-Pass Flat Iron
summary: SummaryL'ange Le Ceramique Luxe Digital 1-Pass Flat Iron has ultra-smooth plates with proprietary ceramic coating, designed for 1-pass styling, preserving moisture levels, boosting shine and eliminating frizz. Curved edges enable you to wear hair smooth and straight one day or perfectly curled the next.
details: DetailsBenefitsEasy one-pass stylingProprietary ceramic platesLocks in moisture & shineLong-lasting frizz-free resultsFeaturesDigital LCD display1 hour auto shut-offAdjustable temperature control: 200-450 degrees FRapid heating in under 1 minuteProfessional 360 degrees swivel cordDual-voltage: 110-240VItem 2585788How To UsePlug the tool into an outlet and turn ONSelect desired temperature using the +/- buttonThe tool will be ready for use in less than 1 minuteHair should be detangled and completely dryApply the heat protectant of your choiceInsert a 1" - 2" strand of hair between the platesStarting near your roots, gently press downSlide the flat iron from root to tip at a moderate pacePro Tip: Twist your wrist mid-shaft in the preferred direction for effortless curls and waves.
how_to_use: Plug the tool into an outlet and turn ONSelect desired temperature using the +/- buttonThe tool will be ready for use in less than 1 minuteHair should be detangled and completely dryApply the heat protectant of your choiceInsert a 1" - 2" strand of hair between the platesStarting near your roots, gently press downSlide the flat iron from root to tip at a moderate pacePro Tip: Twist your wrist mid-shaft in the preferred direction for effortless curls and waves.

reviews.headline: Great quality for frizzy hair
reviews.comments: Although the price was high, I can say that it is a good quality flat iron

reviews.headline: Worked great until it didn't
reviews.comments: Had this brand that was digital one for about 3-4 years and used daily. All of sudden the cord got loose and moved around where it connects to the iron. This would make it shut off and I would have to restart it. I was able to hold cord in place against the iron and keep it on and keep using. Did that for about 2-3 weeks. One day it popped real loud a couple of times and sparks flew out of it. Scared me and luckily got unplugged and threw in trash.

reviews.headline: I would not buy it again.
reviews.comments: I prefer my iron to stay on and retain its temperature setting. It's inconvenient to have to turn it on and reset the temperature every time I plug it in.

reviews.headline: Yes
reviews.comments: I was hesitant to try this straightener, thought it wouldn't really straighten my hair especially for that price, but now I think I will purchase only that brand. I have thick wavy hair, but I trust this straightener to straighten my hair about the only that's been able to

reviews.headline: Great straightener but doesn't last
reviews.comments: Was a great straightener, left my hair very shiny and didnt cause a lot of damage but it stopped working less than 2 years after i got it. It wont stay turned on

reviews.headline: Makes hair poofy
reviews.comments: Makes my hair so poofy

reviews.headline: I wanted to love, but...I don't
reviews.comments:
I was in need of a new flat iron and did a lot of research on different tools.  I liked this one for the sleek look, black color, longer heated pads than my previous flat iron.   It heats up quickly and can really straighten well. 
What I don't like is that the display says OFF all the time (when turned off) - this is a good indicator that it's off, but is also unnecessary especially when I usually leave my iron plugged in all the time and it leaves a glowing light in the dark.   I also don't like that the default temperature is 400. That is very hot and requires me to turn it down to a lower temp *every single time* I turn it on.   Lastly, I find that I have to 'squeeze' the tongs together a bit more than I realize to get it to hold my hair -- I don't think you should have to 'squeeze' that hard for a tool that is literally meant to be pressed together.  
All in all, it's nice tool at a nice price point, but I'm still debating whether to return it or not (inside the return period).  I don't think I would buy it again.

reviews.headline: Ehhh
reviews.comments: Great for heating up QUICKLY and making adjustments in temp but probably had the straightener for maybe 3 yrs tops and out of nowhere just died.

reviews.headline: I liked while it worked
reviews.comments: I got this for Christmas in December 2023 and it worked good unitl it didnt. It wont staty on anymore. I would not recommend

reviews.headline: I did like itâ€¦
reviews.comments: â€¦when it worked. I've had this flat iron for a little over a year, and I didn't use it often. Yesterday I went to turn it on and it would say "on" for about 1 second and then go off. Did everything I could think of, nothing. Same today. Garbage.

reviews.headline: I'm so happy with this flat iron
reviews.comments: When I found myself in need of a new flat iron, I purchased this one based on the reviews. I quickly discovered how bad my other flat iron was!  This iron heats quickly.  The buttons are in a good place, and I don't find myself unknowingly changing the temperature, or worse, turning the thing off!  I am looking forward to many years of use.

reviews.headline: Too cute!!
reviews.comments: This is the cutest straightener I have ever used! I was so excited to use it and I absolutely love it!  The packaging is so luxurious! It's a whole experience! I definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: My fav straightener ever
reviews.comments: Originally bought this because I'm obsessed with light pink but i ended up absolutely loving it it heats up super fast and makes my hair so silky BUY IT

reviews.headline: Best Ever
reviews.comments: I would recommend this to everybody! It heats up quickly and straightens my hair with one pass. You can pay more for other brands but no need to do that. This is the best!

reviews.headline: Disappointing!
reviews.comments: I was so excited to get this as I got a great deal on it and the reviews are good. What a disappointment. It made a staticky noise the whole time, and really made my hair look dry and not super straight. I ran it through my hair multiple times but it still didn't work well.

reviews.headline: LOVE!
reviews.comments: I have the blow dryer that gives volume and I love it! I wanted a new flat iron as mine was super old and I fell in love! I have very curly and frizzy hair and this makes it so shiny and pretty! It's also easy to get a curl for your ends!!

reviews.headline: Leaves my hair super straight and shiny
reviews.comments: Absolutely love this straightner. I don't have anything negative to say about it.it straightens my extremely thick and very long hair in 40 minutes (sometimes less). With other straightners it would always take me over an hour to straighten my hair. I have been using it for over a year now and i still love it. I got the pink one!

reviews.headline: So far good but it makes a buzzing sound.
reviews.comments: I bought 2 and both do this buzzing sound, which is concerning.  Not sure if I"m keeping them. Other than that it seems like a good straightener.

reviews.headline: L'ange disappoints again
reviews.comments: I just got this straightener and was excited to try it out. I plugged it in chose my temp and as soon as it stops flashing to say its heated the screen says OFF. I tried multiple times but no, it just doesn't work. Every time i try something from this brand I'm left disappointed. I guess i need to stop giving l'ange more chances.

reviews.headline: Didn't turn on
reviews.comments: I was so excited to try this straightener but it would not turn on. I waited over an hour for it to heat up but nothing.

media.headline: It's okay..
media.caption: Purple marks from my fingers, doesn't were off either.

media.headline: Makes a Buzzing Noise When On
Makes a Buzzing Noise When On

faceoff_positive.comments: I am a #1 fan of all Lange' products! I have every hot tool and their hair dryers all of which are awesome tools for hair that's thin, thick, curly or straight! I love my latest purchase the Le Ceramic. I like to use my Le Ceramic especially when I have gone 2-3 days without washing my hair because it has the ceramic plates that your hair will glide smoothly through. Like I said I love all my Lange' hot tools! If you don't have the Le Ceramic you really need to purchase one and I bought mine when they were 30% off any hot tool, you can sometimes run into a daily sale of 50% off which is really awesome! Purchase the Le Ceramic and you will have shiny smooth hair even when it has been 2-3 days without washing your hair!!ðŸ˜ƒ #langeproductsarethebest #purchaserfor4years
faceoff_positive.headline: Le Ceramic Straightener in Blush

rollup.name: Le Ceramique Luxe Digital 1-Pass Flat Iron
